info.name: Google dark search 2021
info.description:
DISCONTINUED
Sorry Guys, they just change to much all the time to keep up.
Feel free to use this code and edit it.
If you allready have it: the google search has a build in dark mode (only for some users aparantly). When you have it, it is on the top right of the google search beside the profile picture and google apps.
Thank you ;)
info.additionalInfo:
ORIGINAL STYLE: https://userstyles.org/styles/153816/darksearch-nass-o-fork
I Just added many things
Newest fix on bottom
-fixed white line under search bar in googles new design
-fixed white footer under google picture search
-fixed small round recomendation buttons in google search and picture search
-fixed small info button on google shopping page
-fixed "do you meen [...]" recomendation
-fixed white header
-fixed account menue
-fixed some buttons from Google Complementary results
-fixed some buttoms from the bottom of a google search
-fixed hr from view all button
-fixed video preview in search
-fixed info- and "People also search for"- Tabs
-fixed sponsored items in shopping tab
-fixed google response for simple questions
-fixed special google search for specific words
-fixed google graphs
-fixed small images on top of google saerch
-fixed "It looks like there aren't many great matches for your search"
-fixed white bar on top of picture search
-fixed some dark text
-fixed "was this helpful?" buttons
-fixed "help make google better"-Card
-fixed account menue ... again, but now right
-fixed new cards on top of search without borders
-deleted some unnecessary stuff, but probably not everything
-fixed subheadings from search suggestions
-fixed some buttons
-fixed some wron colors in header and on the side of video cards
-fixed doubble line on top of google search
-fixed that the line under one list is not longer invisible
-dark calculator, conversion and translator inputs
-fixed account menue ... again, again
-fixed videos secrion in search
-fixed some buttons in google product info
-fixed input-tags on  random number generator
-fixed feedback menue
-fixed some white spaces in google search
-fixed yt key moments / "in this video"-feature in google search
-fixed google fimls and series
